programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. As the Second World War rages, American fashion model-turned-photographer Elizabeth "Lee" Miller defies the expectations of the era and travels to mainland Europe as a war correspondent for Vogue. Reporting from the frontline, Miller captures indelible images of the conflict, including the horrors found in the Nazi concentration camps at Buchenwald and Dachau Ellen Kuras - Director Kate Winslet - Lee Miller Andy Samberg - Davy Scherman Alexander Skarsgård - Roland Penrose Marion Cotillard - Solange D'Ayen Andrea Riseborough - Audrey Withers Noémie Merlant - Nusch Eluard Josh O'Connor - Young Man / Antony Penrose James Murray - Colonel Spencer Arinzé Kene - Major Jonesy Vincent Colombe - Paul Eluard.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, War, Drama, Action, History ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. The ensuing 15-hour battle saw the deaths of nearly 20 American soldiers, and hundreds of Somalis, after two Black Hawk helicopters were shot down Ridley Scott - Director Josh Hartnett - Ranger Staff Sgt Matt Eversmann Ewan McGregor - Ranger Spec Grimes Tom Sizemore - Ranger Lt Col Danny McKnight Eric Bana - Delta Sgt First Class \Hoot\ Gibson William Fichtner - Delta Sgt First Class Jeff Sanderson Ewen Bremner - Specialist Shawn Nelson Sam Shepard - Maj Gen William F Garrison Gabriel Casseus - Ranger Spec Mike Kurth Kim Coates - Delta Master Sgt Chris \Wex\ Wexler Hugh Dancy - Ranger Sgt First Class Kurt Schmid Ron Eldard - Chief Warrant Officer Mike Durant Ioan Gruffudd - Ranger Beales Jeremy Piven - Chief Warrant Officer Cliff Wolcott Brendan Sexton III - Ranger Private First Class Richard Kowalewski Jason Isaacs - Captain Mike Steele Orlando Bloom - Private First Class Todd Blackburn Zeljko Ivanek - Harrell Glenn Morshower - Matthews Tom Hardy - Twombly Carmine Giovinazzo - Goodale Matthew Marsden - Sizemore Treva Etienne - Firimbi Ty Burrell - Wilkinson.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou. When the victim of a ritualised killing is discovered at the Louvre, French cryptographer Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon are called in to try to identify strange symbols cut into the body. They become embroiled in a deadly conspiracy that has shattering ramifications for Christianity Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Audrey Tautou - Sophie Neveu Ian McKellen - Sir Leigh Teabing Alfred Molina - Bishop Aringarosa Jürgen Prochnow - André Vernet Paul Bettany - Silas Jean Reno - Bezu Fache Etienne Chicot - Lt Collet Jean-Pierre Marielle - Jacques Sauniere Clive Carter - Detective Chief Inspector.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Ewan McGregor - Camerlengo Patrick McKenna Ayelet Zurer - Vittoria Vetra Stellan Skarsgård - Commander Richter Pierfrancesco Favino - Inspector Ernesto Olivetti Nikolaj Lie Kaas - Mr Gray / Assassin Armin Mueller-Stahl - Cardinal Strauss Thure Lindhardt - Chartrand David Pasquesi - Claudio Vincenzi Cosimo Fusco - Father Simeon.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.sub-title: Action, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Crime/detective, Arts And Culture ║ 2016 ║ 12
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestseller by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Felicity Jones. Renowned symbologist Dr Robert Langdon wakes up in a Florence hospital with a head injury and no memory of the previous 48 hours. However, he soon finds himself hunted and forced to undertake a globe-trotting race against time to prevent the release of a deadly virus capable of killing half the world's population Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Felicity Jones - Dr Sienna Brooks Irfan Khan - Harry Sims, \The Provost Omar Sy - Christoph Bouchard Ben Foster (1) - Bertrand Zobrist Sidse Babett Knudsen - Dr Elizabeth Sinskey Ana Ularu - Vayentha Ida Darvish - Marta Paul Ritter - Arbogast.

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. Toula's husband Ian joins the madcap expedition along with extended family including her brother Nick and Aunt Voula. programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Her teenage daughter, Astrid, is sceptical and distant, still mourning the death of her father some years before. But then Astrid has her own perilous brush with the beyond - and her despairing mother realises there's only one being who can help her out.. programme.title: Man of Steel

programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams and Russell Crowe. In a far away galaxy, as the planet Krypton is about to explode, scientist Jor-El sends his baby son Kal to Earth. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Big Heat
programme.desc: 1950's American film noir crime drama following a straight-arrow police detective as he takes on the crime syndicate that controls his city. (1953)(90 mins).

programme.title: Melancholia (1989)
programme.desc: Art critic Keller's radical past comes back to bite when he's asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer. Cerebral thriller. (1989)(87 mins).

programme.title: Chinatown
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson stars as a private detective whose nose for trouble draws him into the sick heart of LA. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (1974)(125 mins).

programme.title: The Day Of The Jackal
programme.desc: When meticulous hitman Edward Fox is hired to kill the French president, detective Michael Lonsdale faces a race against time to track him down. Violent scenes. (1972)(137 mins).

programme.desc: Douglas Trumbull's cult sci-fi drama stars Bruce Dern as a botanist charged with looking after Earth's last remaining plant life. Flashing images/mono sound only. (1972)(85 mins).

programme.title: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: Eerie, vintage sci-fi tale based on a Ray Bradbury story. A writer sees a strange craft crash in the Arizona desert, but none of the townsfolk believe him. (1953)(77 mins).

programme.desc: Art critic Keller's radical past comes back to bite when he's asked to assassinate a Chilean murderer. Cerebral thriller. (1989)(87 mins).

programme.desc: 1950's American film noir crime drama following a straight-arrow police detective as he takes on the crime syndicate that controls his city. (1953)(90 mins).

programme.title: Rear Window

programme.title: 1963 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 25/5/63. Played at a fully roofed Wembley for the first time, Leicester had achieved the double over United in the league, so the Reds went into this game as the underdogs.

programme.title: 1968 European Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 29/5/68. Matt Busby had led his side from the tragedy of Munich to the brink of glory at Wembley, could they beat Benfica and be crowned kings of Europe?

programme.title: 1977 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/77. FA Cup Final. United were the underdogs and out to spoil Liverpool's chances of a treble.

programme.title: 1983 FA Cup Final Replay
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/83. Brighton had produced a shock to take the first game to a replay, but Bryan Robson and the lads had other ideas this time around.

programme.title: 1985 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 18/5/85. United take on current holders & league champions Everton in a game remembered for the first player ever to be sent off in a Cup Final and a piece of Norman Whiteside magic.

programme.title: 1990 FA Cup Final Replay
programme.desc: United Archives 17/5/90. Hard to live up to the first meeting between these teams five days earlier, United faced Crystal Palace again aiming to secure Alex Ferguson's first major trophy.

programme.title: 1991 CWC Final: v Barcelona
programme.desc: United Archives 15/5/91. United travel to Feyenoord Stadium in Rotterdam to face Barcelona in the 1991 European Cup Winners Cup Final.

programme.title: 1994 FA Cup Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 14/5/94. United were aiming to become the fourth club in the 20th Century to complete The Double & for the first time in the club's history as they took on Chelsea in the FA Cup final.

programme.title: 1996 FA Cup Final: v Liverpool
programme.desc: United Archives 11/5/96. United were aiming to become the first club to win the FA Cup 9 times in this final against Liverpool and also win the League and Cup double on two occasions.

programme.title: 1999 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 22/5/99. Having already won the league, and with Bayern Munich in Barcelona still to come, this FA Cup Final v Newcastle was the second leg of United's quest to win the Treble.

programme.title: Top 20 Goals at Wembley
programme.desc: Stop scrolling, take 10 minutes out and watch United's top 20 goals at Wembley Stadium.

programme.title: 1999 UCL Final v Bayern Munich
programme.desc: United Archives 26/5/99. An absolute classic, with two trophies in the bag only Bayern Munich stood between United and an unprecedented treble.

programme.title: 2004 FA Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 22/5/04. United were clear favourites to lift the FA Cup when they faced Millwall at the Millennium Stadium in May 2004.

programme.title: 2006 League Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 26/2/06. United hadn't won the League Cup since 1992 but travelled to the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff hopeful of victory over Wigan.

programme.title: 2008 UCL Final: v Chelsea
programme.desc: United Archives 21/5/08. 50 years after Munich, 40 years on from Wembley and 9 years after Barcelona, United take on Chelsea bidding to rule Europe for the third time.

programme.title: 2010 League Cup Final
programme.desc: United Archives 28/2/10. The final of the 2010 Carling Cup and United hope to retain the trophy they won 12 months earlier as they took on Aston Villa at Wembley.

programme.title: Top 20 Goals at Wembley
programme.desc: Stop scrolling, take 10 minutes out and watch United's top 20 goals at Wembley Stadium.

programme.title: EFL Cup Final v Soton 16/17
programme.desc: United Archives 26/2/17. The Reds were aiming to lift the first domestic silverware up for grabs in the 2016/17 campaign as they walked out at Wembley to face Claude Puel's Southampton side.

programme.title: EL: Ajax Final 16/17
programme.desc: United Archives 24/5/17. The Reds looked to secure the missing piece of major silverware in their trophy cabinet, as they faced Ajax in the Europa League Final in Stockholm.

programme.title: Indycar Highlights
programme.desc: The 109th Running of the Indianapolis 500 at Indianapolis Motor Speedway, as part of the 2025 NTT IndyCar Series. (25.05).

programme.title: Monaco F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the one-of-a-kind Monaco Grand Prix arrives, as the 2025 field of Formula 1 stars navigate their way around the Principality. (25.05).

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Huddersfield v Leeds
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, a West Yorkshire derby as Huddersfield Town play Leeds United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Newcastle
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Sheffield Wednesday take on Newcastle United in 2017 in the Sky Bet Championship, with both sides looking for promotion chances.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Fulham v Aston Villa
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. In this episode, Fulham looked to maintain their playoff hopes against Aston Villa in the Sky Bet Championship in April 2017.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: N. Forest v Ipswich
programme.desc: Relive some classic matches in English football. Here, Nottingham Forest look to avoid relegation from the Sky Bet Championship as they face Ipswich Town in May 2017.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Chelsea/Man Utd 2016
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2016 as Jose Mourinho returns to Stamford Bridge with his Manchester United side to face Chelsea.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Spurs v United '96
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 1996 and a memorable match between Tottenham and Manchester United at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Spurs v ManU '01
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2001 and a thrilling eight-goal encounter between Tottenham and Man Utd at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: PL Greatest: United v Spurs '12
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, rewind to 2012 and a thrilling five-goal game between Man Utd and Tottenham Hotspur at Old Trafford.

programme.title: Best of The OpenZone 2024
programme.desc: A look at the best moments from The Open Zone during 2024.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Brentford v Swindon
programme.desc: Remember some classic matches from English football. Here, Brentford face Swindon Town in May 2013 in the League 1 semi final at Griffin Park.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Bradford v Arsenal
programme.desc: A look at some of the greatest matches from English football. Here, League 2 side Bradford City take on Premier League giants Arsenal in the Football League Cup in December 2012.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Derby v Hull City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County and Hull City go head-to-head in a thrilling encounter back in 2017.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Sheff Weds v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, relive a thrilling Steel City derby between rivals Sheffield Wednesday and Sheffield United at Hillsborough Stadium.

programme.title: WTA Final: Rabat
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Morocco Open, a WTA 250 clay-court event. (24.05).

programme.title: ATP Final: Geneva
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Geneva Open, an ATP 250 clay-court event. (24.05).

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Soudal Open, a DP World Tour event taking place at Rinkven International Golf Club in Antwerp, Belgium.

programme.title: Rose Ladies Series Golf
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Rose Ladies Series, as West Lancashire Golf staged the opening one-day event of six.

programme.title: Spanish F1 GP Highlights 2023
programme.desc: Max Verstappen has pole at the 2023 Spanish Grand Prix, while home favourite Carlos Sainz joins the Dutchman at the front. Lando Norris and Lewis Hamilton make up the second row. (04.06).

programme.title: Spanish F1 GP Highlights 2024
programme.desc: It's lights out for the 2024 Spanish Grand Prix. A year ago, Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya saw Max Verstappen take the top step with Lewis Hamilton and George Russell joining him. (23.06).

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: The undisputed world super-bantamweight title is on the line in Tokyo, as the formidable Japanese star Naoya Inoue defends his crown against Mexico's Luis Nery. (06.05).

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: Fighting Stateside for the first time in three years, Japanese superstar Naoya Inoue defends his undisputed super-bantamweight title against the dangerous Ramon Cardenas. (05.05).

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Leeds Utd v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: A look at a classic match from the EFL. Here, Leeds and Sheffield United go head-to-head at Elland Road in a thrilling contest back in 2017.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: Ipswich v Sheff Weds
programme.desc: A look at a classic match from the EFL. Here, Ipswich Town and Sheffield Wednesday meet at Portman Road in a four-goal thriller back in 2017.

programme.title: EFL 16/17: QPR v Brentford
